components.description: The word cool, shown enclosed in a square. This generally displays in a shade of blue, or blue-gray on most platforms. Used as a text decoration.
components.title: Squared Cool

description: The word cool, shown enclosed in a square. This generally displays in a shade of blue, or blue-gray on most platforms. Used as a text decoration.
title: Squared Cool

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Enclosed Alphanumeric Supplement -> Squared Latin letter sequences

emoji_net_data.name: COOL button

bn:00100441a: Having a slightly low temperature; mildly or pleasantly cold.
Neither warm nor very cold; giving relief from heat

bn:00105276a: Arousing or holding the attention or interest of someone.

bn:00084893v: To lose heat, to get colder.

bn:00045771n: A computer icon is a pictogram displayed on a computer screen in order to help the user navigate a computer system or mobile device.
A small picture which represents something (such as an icon on a computer screen which when clicked performs some function.)
(computer science) a graphic symbol (usually a simple picture) that denotes a program or a command or a data file or a concept in a graphical user interface
A pictogram used in a graphical user interface
A small picture that represents a file, folder, program, or other object or function.

apple_vendor_description: The cool button emoji on Apple devices shines with a vibrant, almost electric blue, framed by a glossy, raised border that catches the light. Its smooth, rounded surface and subtle gradient create a distinct 3D effect, embodying a sense of effortless style and approval. This emoji conveys a feeling of being trendy, hip, or exceptionally pleased with something, perfect for celebrating achievements or sharing positive reactions.
